name: Albedo
title: Kreideprinz
description: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Albedo creates a Solar Isotoma using alchemy, which deals <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo> on appearance.
4: When opponents within the Solar Isotoma field take DMG, the Solar Isotoma will generate Transient Blossoms which deal <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo>. DMG dealt scales off Albedo's DEF.
Transient Blossoms can only be generated once every 2s.

When a character is located at the locus of the Solar Isotoma, the Solar Isotoma will accumulate Geo power to form a crystallized platform that lifts the character up to a certain height. Only one crystallized platform can exist at a time.
Solar Isotoma is considered a <geo>Geo construct</geo>. Only one Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself can exist at a time.
description.6: Hold to designate the location of the skill.
description.8: This Geo bloom has an unusual property mirrored in the aim of alchemy. To rise from the earth, soar into the sky, and become the sun.

description.0: Under Albedo's command, Geo crystals surge and burst forth, dealing <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo> in front of him.
description.1: If a Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself is on the field, 7 Fatal Blossoms will be generated in the Solar Isotoma field, bursting violently into bloom and dealing <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo>.
description.3: Tectonic Tide DMG and Fatal Blossom DMG will not generate Transient Blossoms.
description.5: Under the Kreideprinz's command, the tectonic tide of creation seethes into life.

description.0: Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma deal 25% more DMG to opponents whose HP is below 50%.
Using Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide increases the Elemental Mastery of nearby party members by 125 for 10s.
When Albedo crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.
Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.
Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
1: Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
This effect stacks up to 4 times.

description.0: Increases the Level of Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma by 3.
Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.
Increases the Level of Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide by 3.
Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.
